archimate:Capability.name: Constituent Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Ability to identify, engage with, collect information on, understand needs of, monitor, update, and validate the status of an individual or a legal entity relative to an organization’s sphere of responsibility.

properties.value: Ability to identify, engage with, collect information on, understand needs of, monitor, update, and validate the status of an individual or a legal entity relative to an organization’s sphere of responsibility.
